message.entry: Invalid setting for property ''{0}''. Property value must be a character vector.
Invalid setting for property ''{0}''. Property value must be a logical scalar.
If UpdateMethod property is set to 'Continuous' or 'Inherited', any changes made to the SampleTime property is ignored.
If UpdateMethod property is set to 'Continuous', AllowDirectFeedthrough must be true. Any changes made to this property is ignored.
If FimathMode is set to 'SameAsMATLAB', any changes made to the Fimath property are ignored.
